text: Eurysops burgeoni is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Stephan von Breuning in 1935. It feeds on Morus alba.BioLib.cz - Eurysops burgeoni. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Subspecies== * Eurysops burgeoni burgeoni Breuning, 1935 * Eurysops burgeoni dudleyi Sudre & Téocchi, 2002 ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1935
title: Eurysops burgeoni
